Using the FirstApp Form

Use the FirstApp to request services and goods from several departments.

  • Mobile
  • Laptop
  • Desktop

FirstApp Form Fields

  1. For new FirstApp records, the Requested for field is pre-populated with your name. If you are opening a FirstApp request for someone else, you can change the value in the Requested for field.
  2. The Requested for email field is automatically populated if you change the user in the Requested for field. You can change the Requested for email field value.
  3. The choices in the What needed field depend on the value in the Request type field.
  4. If the value in the What needed field is Other, the Other field appears. Use the Other field to add a few words about your request.
  5. Use the calendar picker in the When needed field to set the due date for the NeedIt request.
  6. Use the Short description and Description fields to provide more information about your request.
Note: When creating FirstApp requests, the When needed date cannot be today or in the past.

 Need More Help? 

You can learn about form fields on the ServiceNow docs site.
